Milestone.name: Fulfilled Contracts
Milestone.description: Who wants to explore when you can farm the same contract over an over? Let's see how many contracts you can get.

Tier.description: Money doesn't grow from trees, you need to complete contracts from time to time to get some.
Can you get on track and complete a handful of contracts?
If you try to grow a company, the more contracts you fulfill the better you'll make, 15 is a pretty decent start.
You are farming those contracts like a champ, what are you doing to need that much cash?
At this point you have earned a good reputation, can you get into the triple digits?

Milestone.name: Money Spent
Milestone.description: Let the money flow, this will account for all your expenses.

Tier.description: The expenses pile up, by the time you realize you are burning millions as if they were paper.
Right now it may seem surreal to even think you will be expending so much... just wait.
If you manage to spend this much money, you may need to go get some fresh air.
Ok, this will actually be challenging, either you are playing a lot or you are making things out of gold if you hit this.
A trillion in expenses is what you would expect from a company going all around a stellar system, what are you even doing?

Milestone.name: Launched Crafts
Milestone.description: Launch unique crafts into the world.

Tier.description: The more you launch, the more experienced you get. Get familiar with the process.
You seem to be getting familiar with the dynamics, keep on going!
So far you have launched a handful of times, now things get real.
You must be getting the hang of this by now, what is sure is you are at least trying.
At this point are you even flying them or just launching and recovering a cheap craft to get this milestone?

Milestone.name: Scrapping Returns
Milestone.description: Recover crafts to get money in return.

Tier.description: If you plan things ahead of time or are just lucky to get your crafts back, your money savings are going to make up for a large cut of your future investments.
Saving $100k in recoveries is really impressive, this is more than what your first crafts cost!
Imagine being a millionaire just from the money saved by recovering your crafts.
Many companies fail to understand the importance of recovery and refurbishment. By saving 10M$ you are going to have more saved money than their yearly incomes.
Saving a billion just from intelligent planning and engineering, this will put you in everyone's mouths.

Milestone.name: Explosions
Milestone.description: Blow things up, each explosion will add one to the count.

Tier.description: There's no success without failure, and there's no fun without some explosions. Causing 10 explosions is just the start.
Aerospace is infamous for how likely it is for things to go South, but by the time you cause 50 explosions you are going to start to get some looks.
If you get past 250 explosions either you are purposely blowing stuff up or you should reconsider your design process.
You are going for 1000 explosions!? How are you even getting this many?
You have to be doing something insanely well to get enough money to blow this much stuff up, so now that you are at it, let's get those fireworks going!

Milestone.name: Record Altitude
Milestone.description: How high you have gone. When in orbit, this is defined by your apoapsis.

Tier.description: Higher than the tallest of mountains, your first step towards reaching the stars.
Above 30km the atmosphere is thin enough for wings to be useless and drag low enough for hitting record speeds.
At 80km there is no air anymore, you have reached space!
To reach 300km you need a beefy rocket, no matter if you go straight up or orbit the planet.
Look down. Isn't it beautiful?

Milestone.name: Top Speed
Milestone.description: You have reached far around Droo, it's time to reach the stars.

Tier.description: 20km/s is a really fast speed, only for those who dare to get in orbit of Juno.
These are the speeds you would expect to see on a craft exploring the entirety of the Juno system, is it you?
These are insane speeds, you must be almost touching Juno's corona.
1% the speed of light, at this point you are pushing the game to its knees.
Do you have what it takes to go faster than light? The game sure doesn't, what are you even doing?

Milestone.name: Unique Docks
Milestone.description: Try to dock as many unique crafts together as you can.

Tier.description: One of the most challenging things you can do in Droo orbit is docking, can you do it at least once?
If you want to start colonizing other worlds you need to get some experience docking things together.
Space Stations are usually built in orbit, they require lots of docks, can you pull it off?
You seem to be an expert at docking stuff together, a true profesional space pilot!
At this point you should already know you don't need to be in orbit for the docks to count, right?

Milestone.name: Astronaut Wings
Milestone.description: Put your droods on a stable orbit for their first time.

Tier.description: Droods are one of the most important assets you can have, are you going to risk loosing them?
Sending a single drood to space is impressive, but by the time you have sent 3 nobody will have a doubt on your skills.
The best tool you have to explore space is your crew, train at least 10 in the absence of gravity.
Space Tourism, running a Space Station... you name it. You need to bring more droods up there.
For droods to become interplanetary you need to bring more and more to space, let's spread!

Milestone.name: Flybys
Milestone.description: How many unique crafts have managed to fly by.

Milestone.name: Orbits
Milestone.description: How many unique crafts have reached a stable orbit.

Milestone.name: Landings
Milestone.description: How many crafts have safely landed.

Milestone.name: Highest Climb
Milestone.description: The tallest point is 8430m high, can you find it and stand on top of it?

Milestone.name: Grounded Distance Traveled
Milestone.description: How much you have traveled by land.

Milestone.name: Walked Distance
Milestone.description: How much you have walked with a Drood.

Milestone.name: Land Speed
Milestone.description: Drive as fast as possible without going airborne, your record will be set after you have been grounded for more than 10 consecutive seconds.

Milestone.name: Flybys
Milestone.description: How many unique crafts have managed to fly by.

Milestone.name: Orbits
Milestone.description: How many unique crafts have reached a stable orbit.

Milestone.name: Landings
Milestone.description: How many crafts have safely landed.

Milestone.name: Highest Climb
Milestone.description: The tallest point is 12420m high, can you find it and stand on top of it?

Milestone.name: Grounded Distance Traveled
Milestone.description: How much you have traveled by land.

Milestone.name: Distance Flying
Milestone.expression: (-TimeGrounded > 1 AND SurfaceVelocityLateral > abs(0.5 * SurfaceVelocityVertical) AND AtmosphereHeight > (2 * AltitudeASL)) ? FrameDistanceSurface : 0
Milestone.description: How much you have traveled flying through the atmosphere.

Milestone.name: Walked Distance
Milestone.description: How much you have walked with a Drood.

Milestone.name: Land Speed
Milestone.description: Drive as fast as possible without going airborne, your record will be set after you have been grounded for more than 10 consecutive seconds.

Milestone.name: Air Speed
Milestone.expression: (SurfaceVelocityLateral > abs(5 * SurfaceVelocityVertical) AND 30000 > AltitudeASL AND -10 > TimeGrounded) ? max(value, MachNumber) : value
Milestone.description: Go as fast as you can while under 30km high and keeping your trajectory mostly horizontal without touching the ground for more than 10 seconds.

Milestone.name: Orbits
Milestone.description: How many unique crafts have reached a stable orbit.

Tier.rewardMessage: Congrats on achieving your first orbit around Droo!

Milestone.name: Hyperbolic
Milestone.description: How many unique crafts have managed to get their eccentricity above 1.

Tier.rewardMessage: Congrats on going hyperbolic for the first time!

Milestone.name: Highest Climb
Milestone.description: The tallest point is 7426m high, can you find it and stand on top of it?

Milestone.name: Deepest Dive
Milestone.description: The lowest point is 14114m deep, can you find it and dive to it?

Milestone.name: Grounded Distance Traveled
Milestone.description: How much you have traveled by land.

Milestone.name: Distance Flying
Milestone.expression: (-TimeGrounded > 1 AND SurfaceVelocityLateral > abs(0.5 * SurfaceVelocityVertical) AND AtmosphereHeight > (2 * AltitudeASL)) ? FrameDistanceSurface : 0
Milestone.description: How much you have traveled flying through the atmosphere.

Milestone.name: Distance Navigating
Milestone.description: How much you have navigated in the oceans and lakes.

Milestone.name: Walked Distance
Milestone.description: How much you have walked with a Drood.

Tier.rewardMessage: And I would walk 500 more just to be the man who walks a thousand miles to fall down at your door.

Milestone.name: Distance Swum
Milestone.description: How much you have swam with a Drood.

Milestone.name: Land Speed
Milestone.description: Drive as fast as possible without going airborne, your record will be set after you have been grounded for more than 10 consecutive seconds.

Milestone.name: Water Speed
Milestone.description: Navigate as fast as possible without going airborne, your record will be set after you have been touching the water for more than 10 consecutive seconds.

Milestone.name: Air Speed
Milestone.expression: (SurfaceVelocityLateral > abs(5 * SurfaceVelocityVertical) AND 15000 > AltitudeASL AND -10 > TimeGrounded) ? max(value, MachNumber) : value
Milestone.description: Go as fast as you can while under 15km high and keeping your trajectory mostly horizontal.

Milestone.description: How many unique crafts have managed to fly by.

Milestone.name: Orbits
Milestone.description: How many unique crafts have reached a stable orbit.

Milestone.name: Landings
Milestone.description: How many crafts have safely landed.

Milestone.name: Deepest Point
Milestone.description: The lowest point in the large crater is 23640m deep, can you find it and visit to it?
